author: Mara Wilhelmi

title: 1 | Obtaining data for data extraction
---

At the start of each data extraction process one has to first collect a dataset containing all data sources relevant for the extraction topic.
Various Python packages are available to make this process easier and more efficient.

- [Crossref](./crossref_search.ipynb) can be used to search for relevant articles and metadata
- [Data can be mined](./data_mining.ipynb) from various sources such as ChemRxiv
